title: NBEMS launches AI in Medicine course for doctors; check how to apply, fees, eligibility and more
description: The National Board of Examinations in Medical Sciences (NBEMS) has launched a free, six-month online course on Artificial Intelligence in Medical Education. Aimed at doctors and medical teachers, the program, starting January 2026, will cover AI concepts, applications, and ethical considerations without requiring technical expertise. Participants completing the course will receive a digital certificate from NBEMS.
content:

title: AI to broaden investment opportunities in 2026, smaller firms to benefit: Report
description: The year 2026 is likely to witness broadening of the investment landscape of artificial intelligence (AI), with smaller companies finding specialised niches to launch profitable AI ventures, according to a report by Ambit Wealth.
content: New Delhi [India], January 2 (ANI): The year 2026 is likely to witness broadening of the investment landscape of artificial intelligence (AI), with smaller companies finding specialised niches to launch profitable AI ventures, according to a report b... [2651 chars]

title: Shares are higher in Asia in an upbeat start to the new year
description: BANGKOK, Jan 2:  Asian markets began the new year Friday with gains, while US futures and oil prices also advanced.   Hong Kong’s Hang Seng jumped 2.2 per cent to 26,189.79 on a strong rally in tech shares. E-commerce giant Alibaba climbed 3.2 per cent and search engine and technology company Baidu jumped 7.5 per cent after it said it plans to spin off its artificial intelligence computer chip unit Kunlunxin, which would list shares in Hong Kong early 2027. […]

title: Even the sky may not be the limit for AI data centres
description: Some tech leaders are concerned that the artificial intelligence race will exhaust available land and energy. The solution might lie in orbit.
content:
SAN FRANCISCO: If the architects of the artificial intelligence boom are right, it is only a matter of time before data centres – the giant computing facilities that power AI – will float in orbit and be visible in the night sky like planets.

title: AI Euphoria Lifts Asia Tech as ‘Late-Cycle’ Volatility Looms
description: Asian technology stocks kicked off the year with fresh gains, led by chipmakers and artificial intelligence-related names. Yet investors are growing more wary that the sector’s powerful rally may be entering a more volatile phase.

title: AI godfather Bengio sounds alarm, says do not give AI rights or we may lose the power to shut it down
description: AI godfather Yoshua Bengio has raised concerns over the debate of giving rights to artificial intelligence (AI). According to the Canadian computer scientist, this may leave humans powerless if things go south in the future.
content: Artificial intelligence (AI) models are improving rapidly. AI models today are much faster and productive than they were a year ago. This has sparked debate about whether AI systems should be given legal rights. In essence, this means that AI systems... [2403 chars]

title: Javed Akhtar slams his AI generated video: I am seriously considering reporting the matter
description: Veteran writer-lyricist Javed Akhtar penned a note on his social media on Friday and said the viral video where he claims he has “turned to God” is generated by artificial intelligence and he is considering reporting the matter.
content:

title: Smart farming no longer optional for sustainable agriculture
description: Artificial intelligence and machine learning play an increasingly important role. Algorithms trained on large datasets are used to detect plant diseases, predict yields, optimize input use, and automate tasks such as harvesting and sorting. Computer vision techniques enable early identification of stress or infection in crops, reducing the need for blanket chemical treatments and lowering environmental impact.
content:
A new academic analysis shows just how rapidly smart farming is unfolding and why digital agriculture is increasingly viewed as a strategic solution to some of the world’s most pressing sustainability challenges.
In a study titled Smart Farming and t... [8697 chars]

title: Emotional AI lacks proper oversight as systems move into care and support roles
description: The authors argue that emotional intelligence in humans involves subjective experience, bodily signals, and social learning, elements that artificial systems do not possess. Treating AI systems as if they share human emotional lives leads to category errors and misleading assessments. Instead of asking whether AI systems “feel” emotions or possess empathy in a human sense, the study reframes emotional intelligence in AI as a set of functional capacities that can be observed and evaluated without anthropomorphism.
content: A new research paper argues that current approaches to evaluating emotional intelligence in AI are fundamentally inadequate. The study, titled Why We Need a New Framework for Emotional Intelligence in AI, published on arXiv, proposes a new conceptual... [8062 chars]

title: Hong Kong stocks start 2026 strong on tech rally
description: HONG KONG: Hong Kong stocks kicked off 2026 on a strong note to climb to a one-month high, as renewed optimism towards China's domestic artificial intelligence sector continued to buoy the market.
